note.p: Career: Called to the Bar at Middle Temple (1792); went to India (returned 1799); prepared a code of laws for the Island of Ceylon (1800); first Chief Justice of Ceylon (ca 1800); resigned due to ill health (1806); bought an estate in Buckinghamshire and became a Magistrate; DL for Buckinghamshire; MP for St Mawes (1826-1831); later years spent in St Helier's Jersey
Notes: Bulloch has death place as Exeter
